backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend actor with authorization, blob storage, membership catalog, user profiles, deals, buyers, contracts, and various data models.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to the new format by adding a default membership catalog.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence linking frontend files to two membership-related feature IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base file defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, backend actor initialization, profile loading, and lazy-loading the AppShell.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen showing an access denied message with optional back navigation.
frontend/src/components/AnalysisResultCa: Card component displaying deal analysis metrics, rating badge, and comparable sales.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main layout component that manages navigation, lazy‑loaded pages, sidebar state, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/BuyerCard.tsx: Displays a compact buyer summary card with contact info, budget, and edit action.
frontend/src/components/BuyerEditorDialo: Modal form for creating, editing, and deleting buyers using query hooks and validation.
frontend/src/components/ContractList.tsx: Loads and displays uploaded contracts for a deal with options to view each file.
frontend/src/components/ContractUploader: Handles contract file selection, validation, upload progress, and submission for a deal.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Displays a deal summary card including seller info, ARV, offer, and estimated profit with an edit button.
frontend/src/components/DealEditorDialog: Modal form for creating, updating, and deleting deals including stage, financials, and buyer assignment.
frontend/src/components/FeatureLock.tsx: Displays a locked-feature card explaining required membership tier and triggers a membership navigation event.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyPerforman: Builds a 6‑month bar chart summarizing deal profits and estimated fees using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog collecting basic user profile info and submitting it via useSaveCallerUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/ProfitByZipTable: Renders a table showing total profit grouped by zip code.
frontend/src/components/SignInScreen.tsx: Full-page sign-in UI using Internet Identity with branding and value props.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Error screen showing a message and retry button when startup fails.
frontend/src/components/StartupLoadingSc: Splash/loading screen with branding and animated spinner during app initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Provides a backend actor with optional admin token initialization and basic error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, deals, buyers, analytics, and membership data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/copy.ts: Centralized text constants for navigation labels, errors, empty states, and admin UI copy.
frontend/src/lib/dealMath.ts: Utility functions for calculating MAO, estimated profit, and assignment fees.
frontend/src/lib/membership.ts: Helpers for checking membership feature access and limits and generating lock messages.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Functions to format cents to USD strings and parse USD strings back to cents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point wiring React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface for editing membership pricing and granting tiers to users.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Displays advanced analytics metrics and profit tables for Enterprise users.
frontend/src/pages/BuyersListPage.tsx: Manages buyer list display and editing with membership-gated access.
frontend/src/pages/ContractsPage.tsx: Contracts management page allowing Enterprise users to select deals and upload or view documents.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard, fetching deals and user profile to compute key metrics and display a performance chart and membership info.
frontend/src/pages/DealAnalyzerPage.tsx: Provides an AI-powered deal analyzer with address input, shows analysis results, and allows creating a deal from the analysis.
frontend/src/pages/DealsPipelinePage.tsx: Displays the deal pipeline organized by stages, enforces membership limits, and supports creating and editing deals.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipPage.tsx: Shows membership plans with pricing and features, loads pricing catalog, and allows switching the user’s membership tier.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Defines project state, existing membership-related features, and pending admin and backend feature requests for managing membership catalogs and tiers.
